TopicTitle: FASA Saturn V Apollo Lunar missing mysterious parts

Articles.Content:
Hello, people!

So, I got the great FASA mod, and I'm trying to make it work with RSS (not easy at all, they don't seem to be calibrated one for the other), and I tried to load the FASA stock ship Saturn V Apollo Lunar, but it couldn't load because it seems to be missing these two parts: FASASaturnSLA and FASASaturnUllage.

Does anybody know what these are and any reason I don't have them?

The FASA and RSS mods were downloaded via CKAN.

Thanks in advance!

Edited May 25, 2016 by TheMonkeytect

What configs are you using to make FASA work with RSS? You need something like Realism Overhaul or SMURF to bring everything up to 1:1 scale. Also try downloading and installing manually.

All else fails you'll have to assemble the craft yourself.
